news.headline: TradFi firms are increasingly warming to cryptocurrencies, says Bybit CEO Ben Zhou
news.summary: Ben Zhou founded Bybit in 2018, the world's second-largest crypto exchange by trading volume. Governments and traditional finance institutions are warming to cryptocurrencies.
